message: But I've never heard of an Allmate starting a Rhyme match before. Is that even possible?
I'm still trying to figure it out when Ren charges, growling.
Something occurs to me as I dodge his attack.
Why does he still look like a dog? He's always taken human form in Rhyme before.
Ren lunges at my arm while I'm distracted.
I try to push his face away before his fangs sink into my flesh.
I really should just throw him off, but I don't want to do that to Ren. I can't.
A sharp pain shoots up my arm. He bit me!
Something is... entering me through the wound?
A flood of warmth and sorrow... joining the pain to strip my thoughts away.
I recognized everything. So much so that they almost seemed like my own memories.
It's almost like Ren has always seen the world through my eyes...
My vision goes black for a moment.
The next thing I see is myself, flinging Ren away.
How could he do that to Ren?!
